thread.title_full: Wrangler Rubicon Recon, 2018 Nissan Leaf, self-driving Chevy Bolt EV: What’s New @ The Car Connection

author: Andrew Ganz (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Wrangler Rubicon Recon, 2018 Nissan Leaf, self-driving Chevy Bolt EV: What’s New @ The Car Connection
text: Jeep builds its most capable Wrangler ever It seems inevitable that the first stop anyone who buys a 2017 Jeep Wrangler Rubicon Recon will make after leaving the dealership is a tire shop. Consumers want to buy cars online and prefer dealers who offer it, so what's the holdup? These days, you can buy just about anything online: clothing, food...
